tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE bioplastic_production (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  process_name VARCHAR(255),
  organic_material_used VARCHAR(255),
  energy_consumption DECIMAL,
  emissions_generated DECIMAL,
  water_usage DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE bioplastic_production_processes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    process_name VARCHAR(255),
    raw_material VARCHAR(255),
    production_date DATE,
    environmental_impact FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE lifecycle_assessment (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    process_id INT,
    assessment_date DATE,
    efficiency FLOAT,
    emissions_reduction FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE production_processes (
    process_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    process_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    material_id INT NOT NULL,
    facility_id INT NOT NULL,
    production_date DATE,
    carbon_footprint FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE bioplastic_materials (
    material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(255),
    material_type VARCHAR(100),
    material_source VARCHAR(100),
    material_properties TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    process_id INT,
    material_id INT,
    carbon_footprint DECIMAL(10,2),
    energy_consumption DECIMAL(10,2),
    water_usage DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE impact_measurements (
  measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_id INT,
  process_id INT,
  category_id INT,
  value DECIMAL,
  FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES bioplastic_materials(material_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (process_id) REFERENCES manufacturing_processes(process_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES impact_categories(category_id)
);
